articles.author: Supoj Wancharoen
articles.title: BMA pushes to rid city of amphetamine abuse
articles.description: The Bangkok Metropolitan Administration (BMA) is pushing to rid Bangkok of amphetamines following the child centre massacre in Nong Bua Lam Phu.
articles.content:
The Bangkok Metropolitan Administration (BMA) is pushing to rid Bangkok of amphetamines following the child centre massacre in Nong Bua Lam Phu.

articles.author: James Corrigan
articles.title: ‘The best of each against the other’ – Jon Rahm wants LIV Golf rebels in the Ryder Cup show
articles.description: Jon Rahm believes the Ryder Cup should feature the best players from the United States and Europe and that next year’s match in Rome should not be made weaker by the LIV Golf rebels being excluded.
